objects.name: Analytic 0329
objects.description: Detects exploitation targeting ESXi/vCenter by correlating attempts to reach known exploitable endpoints (OpenSLP 427, CIM 5989, Hostd/Vpxa HTTPS 443, ESXi SOAP) with vmkernel/hostd crashes, unexpected hostd/vpxa restarts, or new reverse/outbound connections from ESXi host/vCenter to internal assets.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: esxi:hostd
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Keywords: 'Backtrace','Signal 11','PANIC','hostd restarted','assert' or 'Service terminated unexpectedly' in /var/log/hostd.log, /var/log/vmkernel.log, /var/log/syslog.log.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Inbound to tcp/427 (OpenSLP), tcp/443 (vSphere APIs), tcp/902, tcp/5989 followed by new unexpected outbound sessions from the ESXi/vCenter host.

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Crash/restart patterns to match in logs.
